info.name: Sixty Sales CRM API
info.description:
Complete REST API collection for the Sixty Sales Dashboard CRM system.

## Authentication
All requests require an API key via the `X-API-Key` header.

## Base URL
`https://ewtuefzeogytgmsnkpmb.supabase.co/functions/v1`

## Features
- Complete CRUD operations for all entities
- Filtering, pagination, and search
- Rate limiting and error handling
- Business rule validation
- Webhook integration for meetings

Generated: {{$timestamp}}

exec: // Check if API key is set
